titles.title: A resolution providing amounts from the contingent fund of the House for further expenses of investigations and studies by the Committee on Standards of Official Conduct in the second session of the One Hundredth Congress.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.
Subcommittee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Forwarded by Subcommittee to Full Committee.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Reported to House (Amended) by House Committee on House Administration. Report No: 100-818.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 408 - 0 (Record Vote No: 274).

bill.summary: 8/10/1988--Passed House amended. (Measure passed House, amended, roll call #274 (408-0)) Provides amounts to the House Committee on Standards of Official Conduct for the further expenses of investigations and studies. Allows the use of such funds for the procurement of consultant services.
